referredSteps.introText: With Ontario, you can refer a family member or friend, register their information, and if they buy, you can win great prizes. Just follow these steps:

steps.title: Register your referral in the form
steps.description: You must register your referral's information in the REFER HERE form that you will find on our website.

steps.title: Your referral must buy at least one lot and prove that you referred them
steps.description: Your referral must be listed as the owner or co-owner at the time of signing their contract.

steps.title: If your referral buys, YOU WIN!
steps.description: You can win up to s/700 in cash with your successful referral made before the deadline.

texts.termsLabel1: I accept the Terms and Conditions and the Privacy Policy
texts.referredNameRequired: Please enter the referral's first name.
texts.referredSurnameRequired: Please enter the referral's last name.
texts.referredDocumentRequired: Please select a document for the referral.
